div.p: We would like to thank the 2006 and 2007 East Bay field crews for their help with data collection, and I. Butler and R. Kelly for data management. We thank the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada, Canada Research Chairs, Environment and Climate Change Canada, Nunavut Wildlife Management Board, Polar Continental Shelf Project, Canadian Network of Centres of Excellence ArcticNet, and Polar Knowledge Canada for funding and logistical support.
